filter.inkscape:label: Ink Paint
filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Ink paint on paper with some turbulent color shift

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:2.97649px;font-family:'Noto Sans Arabic UI';-inkscape-font-specification:'Noto Sans Arabic UI';stroke-width:0.264583

text.tspan: key = value map of attributes on the task context.
